Verse 1: [Dm]All my [Bb]sins for[F]given [C] [Dm]Far re[Bb]moved as [F]east from [G]west [Dm]Cast in[Bb]to the [F]depths of the [Am]ocean Of [Dm]grace and re[Bb]deeming [Csus C]love

Verse 2: [Dm]All my [Bb]guilt at[F]oned for [C] [Dm]Every [Bb]debt is [F]paid in [G]full [Dm]Though my [Bb]sins were [F]scarlet{,} now [Am]I’m clean [Dm]As a fresh [Bb]fallen [Csus C (to bridge)]snow
